Pre-Game Insights: India will lock horns with Zimbabwe in the 3rd T20I on Wednesday, July 10 at the Harare Sports Club.
Opener Abhishek Sharma stole the show with a breathtaking century, but his position might be up for grabs with the return of India’s World Cup heroes.
Jaiswal and Samson, who haven’t played since the IPL in May, could be finding a place in the playing XI for the 3rd T20I.
Zimbabwe will be looking for a comeback, obviously with better plans against the Men in Blue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Harare proves favourable for batting, as evidenced in the second T20 match between India and Zimbabwe.
Others: Abhishek Sharma is the captain of the Dream11 fantasy team.
Sikandar Raza is the vice-captain of the Dream11 fantasy team.
